meanings.sent1: The tight scarf around his neck seemed to strangles him.
meanings.sent2: She panicked when the smoke from the fire began to strangles her.
meanings.sent3: The overly affectionate puppy would playfully strangles his owner with kisses.

meanings.definition: A contagious disease in horses characterized by inflammation of the mucous membranes in the upper respiratory tract
To suppress or inhibit the development or growth of something
